mapper.select: SELECT user1.user_email as senderEmail, user1.user_name as senderName, user2.user_email as receiverEmail, user2.user_name as receiverName, MAX(callhistory.call_no) AS recent_call_no, DATE_FORMAT(MAX(callhistory.call_starttime), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%m:%s') AS call_starttime, DATE_FORMAT(MAX(callhistory.call_endtime), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%m:%s') AS call_endtime FROM callhistory JOIN users AS user1 ON user1.user_email = callhistory.call_sender JOIN users AS user2 ON user2.user_email = callhistory.call_receiver WHERE callhistory.call_status = 2 AND (callhistory.call_sender = #{userEmail} OR callhistory.call_receiver = #{userEmail} ) GROUP BY user1.user_email, user1.user_name, user2.user_email, user2.user_name ORDER BY recent_call_no DESC
